name: Sonarr
description: Sonarr is an open-source PVR that automatically finds, downloads, organizes, and manages TV shows

name: Radarr
description: Radarr is an open-source PVR that automatically finds, downloads, organizes, and manages Movies

name: Proxmox
description: Proxmox is an open-source virtualization and container management platform that combines KVM, LXC, software-defined storage
